description:
All the students of Asahigaoka Branch School set about to prepare a meal using the produce they`ve grown in the school garden. Komari is in charge of making rice with potatoes. While Hotaru watches, Komari struggles to cook like a pro in hopes of showing up Natsumi, who had accused her of being a lousy cook. Then, when the meal is prepared and it`s time to dig in...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wir haben Reis in der Schule gekocht
学校でごはんを炊いた
